NPWR05556_00.title: Trine 2: Complete Story
NPWR05556_00.note: Trine 2 {PS4 Edition}. Note there is another npcommid for this title, I just do not know it yet. Because this maps onto an adjusted Steam update, achievements like `solo` are not mapped at all! Look into ‘computing’ these in future (having any of 43-45 should imply this)

NPWR05751_00.title: DARK SOULS Ⅱ
NPWR05751_00.note: We map this title onto both the original and the remake on Steam, as they are the same trophies, and if you have both, why not? n.b. Dark Souls 2 uses U+2161 on Sony’s platform, yet II on Valve’s. Which was a nice surprise, considering PSP+PS3 launched with locale-specific charsets in use. Likely due to poor Windows support for Unicode fonts, not that Steam tries hard to improve things.

NPWR07279_00.title: DmC Devil May Cry™: Definitive Edition

With this remastering, various trophies have been adjusted thus: ‘Looks like we have a winner’ decreased to 2500 Demons, ‘This is my kind of rain’ increased to 20000 Red Orbs (which explains why one is mapped, and one is not), some new incremental trophies are added for SSS completion progress, and some difficulty trophies have been removed from original.
